panels.description: Shows when and how often a pod was restarted.  The graph is zero when the pod is ready. With this it is also possible to determine how long it take for the pod to come ready again.
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: Displays the current running pods in the namespace.
panels.title: Running

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed processes per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Processes in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed tasks per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Tasks in avg overtime per sec

panels.description: Total number of committed snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Count

panels.description: Approximate duration of taking a single snapshot from the processor point-of-view (without replication or committing).
panels.title: Snapshot Operation Duration

panels.description: Size in bytes of snapshots on disk
panels.title: Snapshot Size

panels.description: Distribution of snapshot file sizes - each snapshot may be comprised of many files, and this shows approximately how "big" files there are and how many "small" files.
panels.title: Snapshot Files Sizes (1m)

panels.description: On-going snapshot replications from the receiver point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replications

panels.description: Approximate duration of replicating a snapshot, from the receiver point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replication Duration

targets.expr: sum by (pod_name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", cluster="", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="", pod_name=~"$pod", container_name!="POD"}[1m]))

panels.description: Shows the bytes read per second for the zeebe pods in the select namespace.
panels.title: Read bytes/s [1m]

panels.description: Shows the written bytes per second by the Zeebe pods in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Written bytes/s [1m]

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods transmit per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s transmitted [1m]

panels.description: Shows how many bytes the Zeebe Pods have received per second in the selected namespace.
panels.title: Network bytes/s received [1m]

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the command on the dispatcher and processing it.
panels.title: Processing Latency (Command)

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the event on the dispatcher and processing it.
panels.title: Processing Latency (Event)

panels.description: Shows the execution time of a process instance. This means the time (latency) between creating the instance and completing it.
panels.title: Processing Execution Time

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between creating the job and activating it.
panels.title: Job Activation Time

panels.description: Shows the complete lifetime of an job. This means the time (latency) between creating the job and completing it.
panels.title: Job Life Time

panels.description: Approximate Install RPC as measured by the follower.
panels.title: Snapshot Replication Duration

panels.description: Ongoing snapshot replications per partition, from the follower point-of-view.
panels.title: Snapshot Replications
